nodes.text: CEC Island, best known as the CEC Headquarters, was the headquarters of the Corellian Engineering Corporation. The CEC Island was a vast complex of buildings located in the Incorporation Islands district of Coronet City.

Largely used as a public relations tool, the company's real work transpired on the Orbital Industrial Zone high-above the planet. The sprawling, beach-side campus consisted of several buildings and towers, including the Corellian Museum of Space Exploration.
The CEC Island was the site of intense fighting during the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
